page.title: 10ASHILL METHODIST CHURCH
page.content: Ashill Methodist Church is in the Wymondham,Attleborough and Watton circuit,Watton section,with 1 minister to 6 churches.The Sunday service is at 11am except on Anniversary & Harvest Sundays when there are 2. There are around 30 members and a Church council. The 92 year old Church brickwork is sound but restoration is being done to woodwork. Water is being laid on and a toilet is being installed,Work being carried out by Management Services, unemployed youngsters on training schemes. The material costs paid for by the church of well over Â£2000. Social events include Flower Festival, Gad-a-bouts, Coffee Evenings come Fete's and Visiting Choirs. The Womans Fellowship meets every other Monday, Membership around 30,speakers from all over the circuit.
